about_the_game:
Introducing Timepunk – the fast-paced 2D roguelike top-down bullet hell game that takes you on an adrenaline-fueled journey through time! Strap in as you embark on an epic adventure, starting in the Jurassic and prehistoric era – fighting hordes of dinosaurs like the stegosaurus, raptors, pterodactyls and more.

Successfully power up your time portal gun and travel through various timelines to seek revenge against the mysterious Society of Time! The journey won’t be easy as each timeline brings different challenges like robots, wholly mammoths, and unpredictable outcomes like Nazi Zombies riding Mecha-Dinosaurs. Will you find your revenge against the society of time in this pixelated bullet hell by Aden Interactive?

Key Features:


Temporal Odyssey: Begin your quest as a hero from the future thrown into the dinosaur era. Travel through unpredictable time periods, facing relentless waves of enemies in a dynamically generated roguelike experience. Each jump through time brings new challenges, ensuring no two playthroughs are ever the same.

Cooperative Chaos: Time travel is always better with friends! Team up with up to four players and dive into the chaos together. Arm yourselves, coordinate strategies, and unleash destruction as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of different eras.

Survive the Bullet Hell: Brace yourself for an onslaught of bullets and intense dodging. Timepunk is not for the faint-hearted – it's a bullet hell extravaganza where skill and quick reflexes are your greatest allies.

Create Time Portals: Harness the power of time with your very own portal gun. Collect matter from defeated enemies to fuel your portal gun, enabling you to jump back and forth in time. Unlock random upgrades and adapt your strategy on the fly to overcome the challenges of each era.

Timeline Shenanigans: Your actions shape the environment of each time period. Make decisions that will alter the course of history – be prepared to face the consequences. Encounter unique enemies like Mecha-Dinosaur Riding Zombie Nazis based on your choices, adding a thrilling layer of unpredictability.

Defeat the Society of Time: Your ultimate goal is to reach your original timeline in the future and take down the nefarious Society of Time. Confront a variety of powerful adversaries and overcome the obstacles they throw your way. The fate of the entire time-space continuum rests in your hands.

Gear up, team up, and embark on a time-traveling adventure like never before in Timepunk – where the past, present, and future collide in a relentless barrage of bullets and excitement! Are you ready to mess with the timeline?

name: Timepunk

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D Accelerated Card (not integrated)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Explore Timepunk, a 2D roguelike bullet hell! Begin in the Jurassic period battling dinosaurs to power up your portal gun and seek revenge against the Society of Time. Confront challenges – robots, mammoths, Mecha-Dinosaurs, and more. Can you conquer this pixelated bullet hell by Aden Interactive?
